quote: If you don't kill all of us all at once, those who remain will not be the weak.It's the strong who remain, the bent but unbroken, like the iron rods that used to give this concrete its strength.
quote_letters: IF YOU DONT KILL ALL OF US ALL AT ONCE THOSE WHO REMAIN WILL NOT BE THE WEAKITS THE STRONG WHO REMAIN THE BENT BUT UNBROKEN LIKE THE IRON RODS THAT USED TO GIVE THIS CONCRETE ITS STRENGTH
